description:
Commander of N07 Unit to which Iska belongs. Though not good at firsthand combat, she is a very capable leader who respects the judgment of her squad members and is able to respond well to their subtle displays of emotions. She is of small build and owns a baby face, often childlike in her speech and demeanor, but is in fact 22 years old, a fully grown-up adult.
Source: Official page
name: Mismis Klass
